titleStmt.title: For the King and both houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, Ann, 1624-1686.
R. T. (Rebecca Travers), 1609-1688.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Anne Whitehead, Rebecca Travers, Mary Ellson [and 34 other women].
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
